GSD.description:
wifi: brcmfmac: fix use-after-free bug in brcmf_netdev_start_xmit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit e01d96494a9de0f48b1167f0494f6d929fa773ed. For more details please see the references link.
